SELECT TAU.ID, TAU.ART_ID, TAU.USER_ID, AUCTION_START_DATE, AUCTION_START_PRICE, AUCTION_ESTIMATED_MIN_PRICE, AUCTION_ESTIMATED_MAX_PRICE, AUCTION_ATTRACTED, AUCTION_BID_PRICE, AUCTION_BID_DATE,
TAR.ID, ART_TITLE, ART_CATEGORY, ART_MATERIAL, ART_SIZE, ART_DESCRIPTION, ART_END_DATE, TAR.USER_ID,
TAI.ART_IMG_NAME, TAI.ART_IMG_PATH, COALESCE(TAL.ART_LIKE_COUNT, 0) AS ART_LIKE_COUNT FROM TBL_AUCTION TAU JOIN TBL_ART TAR ON TAU.ART_ID = TAR.ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TAI1.ART_ID, TAI1.ART_IMG_NAME, TAI1.ART_IMG_PATH FROM TBL_ART_IMG TAI1 JOIN ( SELECT ART_ID, MIN(ID) AS MIN_ID FROM TBL_ART_IMG GROUP BY ART_ID ) TAI2 ON TAI1.ART_ID = TAI2.ART_ID AND TAI1.ID = TAI2.MIN_ID ) TAI ON TAR.ID = TAI.ART_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ART_ID, COUNT(*) AS ART_LIKE_COUNT FROM TBL_ART_LIKE GROUP BY ART_ID ) TAL ON TAR.ID = TAL.ART_ID
WHERE ART_CATEGORY = '공예'
WHERE ART_CATEGORY = '건축'
WHERE ART_CATEGORY = '서예'
WHERE ART_CATEGORY = '회화'
WHERE ART_CATEGORY = '조각'
WHERE ART_CATEGORY = '한국화'
WHERE ART_CATEGORY = '한국화'
AND AUCTION_START_DATE > SYSDATE
AND AUCTION_START_DATE < SYSDATE AND AUCTION_BID_DATE IS NULL
AND AUCTION_BID_DATE < SYSDATE
AND AUCTION_START_DATE < SYSDATE AND AUCTION_BID_DATE IS NULL
ORDER BY
ART_LIKE_COUNT
TAU.ID
ASC
DESC
OFFSET (#{cursor} - 1) * 15 ROWS FETCH NEXT 15 ROWS ONLY

SELECT TAU.ID, TAU.ART_ID, TAU.USER_ID, AUCTION_START_DATE, AUCTION_START_PRICE, AUCTION_ESTIMATED_MIN_PRICE, AUCTION_ESTIMATED_MAX_PRICE, AUCTION_ATTRACTED, AUCTION_BID_PRICE, AUCTION_BID_DATE,
TAR.ID, ART_TITLE, ART_CATEGORY, ART_MATERIAL, ART_SIZE, ART_DESCRIPTION, ART_END_DATE, TAR.USER_ID,
TAI.ART_IMG_NAME, TAI.ART_IMG_PATH
FROM TBL_AUCTION TAU JOIN HR.TBL_ART TAR ON TAU.ART_ID = TAR.ID JOIN HR.TBL_ART_IMG TAI ON TAR.ID = TAI.ART_ID WHERE TAU.ID = #{id}
